attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: 30% increase in war compensation for those who fought in Afghanistan/Iraq/we think this should include those who fought in Bosnia/falklands/N Ireland.

rejection.details:
At the moment your petition reads:

We petition the Prime Minister to pension4army.

Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
